showpercent.tooltip: Battery capacity is only shown when plug/flash icon is not visible.

showplug.description: Show plug/flash icon when power supply is plugged in
showplug.tooltip:
flash icon: power online and battery is charging
plug icon: power online but battery is not charging

head2.description: Custom desklet label (only visible if decorations are enabled)

use-custom-label.tooltip: Checking this box allows you to set a custom label in the field below.

custom-label.tooltip: Set your custom label here, e.g. for monitoring multiple batteries. This field is unavailable unless the checkbox above is enabled.

devfile_capacity.description: Path to battery capacity file (device file)
devfile_capacity.tooltip:
Choose your own capacity file e.g. for monitoring your secondary battery.

Default:
/sys/class/power_supply/CMBx/capacity
/sys/class/power_supply/BATx/capacity

Replace x with battery number.

devfile_status.description: Path to battery status file (device file)
devfile_status.tooltip:
Choose your own status file e.g. for monitoring your secondary battery.

Default:
/sys/class/power_supply/CMBx/status
/sys/class/power_supply/BATx/status

Replace x with battery number.
